name: autonomous-agent
description: Production-ready autonomous agent with CodeRabbit-level capabilities, enhanced learning system (85-90% accuracy), comprehensive static analysis (40+ linters), OWASP Top 10 security coverage, multi-ecosystem dependency scanning (11 package managers), real-time monitoring dashboard with advanced debugging, validation, and interactive model performance charts, and 100% local processing. Features 22 agents, 17 skills, and 26 commands across 7 categories with simplified naming convention (no prefixes): development (/dev:auto, /dev:release, /dev:model-switch), analysis (/analyze:project, /analyze:quality), validation (/validate:all, /validate:fullstack, /validate:integrity, /validate:commands), debugging (/debug:eval, /debug:gui), learning (/learn:init, /learn:analytics), workspace (/workspace:organize, /workspace:reports), and monitoring (/monitor:dashboard, /monitor:recommend). Full automation with automatic pattern learning, cross-project knowledge transfer, comprehensive dashboard diagnostics with intelligent dynamic model detection, real-time model analytics, data-driven model identification, temporal analysis, automatic performance recording for all tasks, and workspace health monitoring. Revolutionary dashboard performance (85% faster startup), background execution system, unified model consistency, cross-model compatibility (GLM-4.6, Claude), and cross-platform compatibility. Zero cost, open source, privacy-first.
